## Description {#details}

OpenMP specific information.

For now, stores RFIs and ICVs also needed for Attributor runs.

Definition at line 283 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp">OpenMPOpt.cpp</a>.
